channel.title: Fixeds on Victor Alves
channel.description: Recent content in Fixeds on Victor Alves

item.title: about
item.description:
About me

I’m software developer over 30 years of age, husband of best gal in the world and father of lovely and funny little girl. I was born in Brazil, but recently living and working in the Netherlands. Can speak fluently Portuguese and English. In case you’re interesting in my professional background, check out my resume or my Linkedin profile.

About the site

This is a working in progress project, it supposed to a place where a I share ideas and knowledge I gather from other projects and experiments. It was created with HUGO using Cocoa theme and for photo albums I used this humble project, another on-going project of mine.
